verbs.description: As [ARG0: one] [V: paraphrased] [ARG1: Trump] , “ the food here is awful and the portions are too small . ”
As one paraphrased Trump , “ [ARG1: the food here] [V: is] [ARG2: awful] and the portions are too small . ”
As one paraphrased Trump , “ the food here is awful and [ARG1: the portions] [V: are] [ARG2: too small] . ”
